report.name: factae

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select tmp.socfact as socfact, tmp.typfact as typfact, tmp.numfact as numfact, tmp.lnum as lnum, to_char(tmp.datfact,'dd/mm/yyyy') datfact, to_char(tmp.date_reglt,'dd/mm/yyyy') date_reglt, tmp.montht as montht, tmp.tva as tva, tmp.socfour as socfour, tmp.libsocfour as libsocfour, to_char(tmp.moisprest,'mm/yyyy') mois_prest, tmp.codcompta as codcompta, tmp.dpg as dpg, to_number(decode(tmp.typfact,'A','-','') || to_char(tmp.montht)) signeht, tmp.centre_frais as centre_frais, f.numcont as numcont, f.cav as avenant, r.rnom as nom from tmp_factae tmp,facture f,ligne_cont lc,ressource r where tmp.fcoduser= :P_PARAM1 and tmp.numfact=f.numfact and tmp.socfact = F.socfact AND tmp.typfact = F.typfact AND tmp.datfact = F.datfact and f.fcoduser=tmp.fcoduser --and f.numcont is null OR and f.soccont=lc.soccont and f.numcont=lc.numcont and f.cav=lc.cav and lc.ident=r.ident

dataSource.name: Q_2
dataSource.select: select to_char(date_envoi,'DD/MM/YYYY') date_envoi from tmp_factae where fcoduser=:P_PARAM1 and rownum<2

dataSource.name: Q_3
dataSource.select: select count( distinct numfact) nbrefact from tmp_factae where fcoduser=:P_PARAM1

textSegment.string: - FACTURES ENVOYEES A lA COMPTABILITE SIEGE -

function.name: cf_montantttcformula
cf_signettcformula
afterreport
